page.title: 03INDUSTRY
page.content:
To the north of the town, is the Industrial Estate. This is separated from the housing areas by a park and open space. Several large factories are there, like Fords and Yardleys.
These factories provide employment for many of the people that live in Basildon. Many of the wives also work.
New factory sites are being developed around the other edges of Basildon, and these are attracting more of the high technology sort of industries.
Gordons Gin have just opened the biggest distillery in Europe to the west side of Basildon.
